pageProps.title: Using Expo with React Native: Features and Benefits
pageProps.metaDesc:
React Native is a popular framework for building cross-platform mobile applications. It allows developers to write code once and deploy it on both iOS and Android devices. However, building a React Native application from scratch can be time-consuming, especially if you need to set up the development environment and configure the build tools.

This is where Expo comes in. Expo is a set of tools and services that make it easier to develop, build, and deploy React Native applications. In this article, we will explore the features and benefits of using Expo with React Native.
